keywords.DESCRIPTION: Triggered every time a Skill card is played.
If the number of #yEarth #yEssence reaches 5, NL you can't play any Attack card or Power card. NL The maximum of #yEarth #yEssence is 5.
Costs a corresponding number of #yEarth #yEssence to activate.
Spend a corresponding number of #yShadows to activate.
If you have enough #yEnergy, NL they will automatically spent to activate the effects. NL (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, NL it can be played as a Skill card instead for the #yAccelerate cost. NL Only the #yAccelerate effects will activate if played in this way. (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)

If you do not have enough #yEnergy, cards with Crystallize can be played as a Power card instead for the #yCrystallize cost. NL Only the #yCrystallize effects will activate if played in this way. (Won't trigger if the card is not being played from hand.)
Trait. NL Represented by #yBelphomet. Generally good at making tokens.
Select one or more cards. Different effects will activate depending on the cards chosen.
Automatically adds card to your hand if certain conditions have been met. #yInvocation will only activate once for each card per turn, even if you have multiple copies in your deck.
Trait. NL Represented by the #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, which can trigger certain effects.
Trait, short for Artifact. NL Unique to #yPortalcraft. Play with other #yAF cards to trigger certain effects.
If you already have #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, you draw 1 card when another #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree is played.
Right click the card with Fusion effect to Exhaust specific cards to trigger effects. Can only be performed on an individual card once per turn.
Trait. NL Unique to #yRunecraft. Has certain effects when played alongside other Mysteria cards. Represented by #yAnne and #yGrea.
Trait. NL Unique to #ySwordcraft. Has certain effects when played alongside other Levin cards. Represented by #yAlbert.
Activates if your turn number is equal to or greater than #yUnion #yBurst value. Can be upgraded multiple times to reduce the value.
#yExhaust an Attack card from your discard pile and gain #yShadows.
Select the corresponding number of Attack cards in your hand to remove from this combat and gain #yShadows. These cards are considered played this combat.
Increases when playing cards or triggering specific effects. Spend #yShadows to trigger #yNecromancy effects.

Randomly add a copy of 1 of the highest-cost Attack cards that costs no more than the Reanimate value played this combat to your hand, then change its cost to 0 this turn. NL (Won't trigger if the cost of the card with #yReanimate is 0.)
Effects that trigger when the card is #yExhausted or under other special circumstances.
The count reduces by 1 at the beginning of your turn. Will lose its original effects and trigger specific effects when the #yCountdown reaches 0.
#yVengeance becomes active once you have no more than 1/2 of your HP left. Certain cards have effects trigged by #yVengeance.
#yWrath is active when you have taken damage during your turn at least 7 times in a combat. Certain cards have effects trigged by #yWrath.
#yAvarice is active when at least 6 cards have been drawn from your draw pile in a turn. Certain cards have effects trigged by #yAvarice. You lose this effect at the end of your turn.
Heal HP equal to the damage dealt. (Lose this effect at the start of next turn)
#yResonance is active when your draw pile has an even number of remaining cards. Certain card have effects triggered by #yResonance.

Cards with #yManeuver can't be played from hand directly. If another Attack card with cost higher than the #yManeuver value is played while this card is in hand, the Attack card will lose its effects and #yExhaust, then this card can be played. If this card is #yExhaust , it will return the Attack card into your hand with 0 cost to play this turn.

Passive: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Gain 6 #yBlock. If #yResonance is active or you have the Power #yNaterran #yGreat #yTree, summon a new #yCannon #yHermit #yCrab with half of the current state (round up the value). NL When #yEvoked, deal damage and gain #yBlock repeatedly until its Health reaches 0.
Reduce damage from Power to 0.

#ySkybound #yArt effects activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded for multiple times, and each time the #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1.

#ySuper #ySkybound #yArt effects activate if your turn number is equal to or greater than the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value. Can be upgraded for multiple times, and each time the #ySuper #ySkybound #yArt value of the cards decreases by 1.

Your #yRally count increases by 1 each time you summon an allied follower or play an Attack card that isn't a #yStrike. #yRally effects activate if your #yRally count is equal to or more than the #yRally value.
Effects with #yLimit can only be activated once per combat.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/2 NL Passive: Apply #yWeak equal to Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 5 times Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/1 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

5/6 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times Attack, gain #yBlock equal to Attack next turn and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
1/4 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 3 times Attack, summon a #yKnight and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.

3/3 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to 3 times Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Next turn, gain #yEnergy . NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.

1/1 NL Passive: Apply 1 #yVulnerable , deal damage equal to 3 times Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0

3/2 NL Passive: Apply #yVulnerable equal to Attack and deal damage equal to 3 times Attack to random enemy and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. Next turn, gain #yEnergy . NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0, gain #yEnergy immediately.
2/3 NL Passive: Gain #yBlock equal to 2 times Attack and lose 1 Health by the end of your turn. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until its Health reaches 0.
Enemy, approximately 30 HP. Put a #yDutiful #ySteed into your hand.
Refers to #yGilded #yBlade, #yGilded #yGoblet, #yGilded #yBoots, and #yGilded #yNecklace.
Trigger the followers' passive effects.
Undo the upgrade of this card for this combat after being played. The damage and #yBlock won't decrease. Can be upgraded by specific effects again. NL Won't affect the next combat.
This #yAmulet won't go to discard pile after its #yCountdown reaches 0 and will instead disappear during this combat.
8/8 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack (affected by #yStrength) to a random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health (affected by #yDexterity) at the end of your turn.
6/6 NL Passive: Deal damage equal to Attack (affected by #yStrength) to a random enemy, gain #yBlock equal to Health (affected by #yDexterity) at the end of your turn.
Choose from #yAmbush and #yAttack by the end of your turn. Choosing #yAmbush will not trigger passive effects and will gain 1 Attack. Can't choose #yAmbush if passive effects have been triggered.
Trait.

2/2 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to 3 times Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health. Add a #yGlittering #yGold to your hand. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until Health reaches 0.

3/3 NL Passive: At the end of your turn, deal damage equal to 2 times Attack to a random enemy and lose 1 Health. NL When #yEvoked, repeat passive effects until Health reaches 0. NL Whenever you play a #yGlittering #yGold, #yCommand this #yFollower.
